General.Name: MPM Corpóreos S.A
General.Description: MPM Corpóreos S.A. operates as a laser hair removal company in Brazil. As of December 31, 2021, it had 729 owned and franchised laser hair removal stores in Brazil; 13 laser hair removal stores in Argentina through the partner Definit brand; 7 private label stores in Colombia; 12 stores in Chile; and 10 Estudioface stores, which offers facial aesthetic services. MPM Corpóreos S.A. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida do Eucaliptos, no. 762, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04517050
